name: Mike Santos
text: Theory: di kaya he's saying all these because he wants to project an image that the masses (majority of voters) can better relate to him. People love action stars/macho type. How many senators got elected through this?     Maybe all of these are just means to and end. The end being the presidency... afterwhich, his real programs would unfold. Many cheered (or at least smiled) when he admitted on the debates that he would just copy what the others are planning. Sanay naman dw sya mangopya since grade 1. Charming the masses to his side?     People hate intellectuals. That's whh he claimed that puro 75 lng sya nun. But in law school he did good. Pasang-awa like common tao, yet magaling sa law school which boosts his qualification.     DU30's PR team is good.
